string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Deco_DrakyPET
string.body: Daeva says I'm a cute baby!

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Deco_DrakyPET
string.body: Come sooooooon!

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Deco_DrakyPET
string.body: Attention! Attention!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Yay! I'm cute?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Whee! Happy Drakie!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Say it again! Say it again!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Daeva loooooves me. Really loves me!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Happy dance time?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Nose pokes of friendship!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Give me more! Give me more!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Love you too. Kew.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Go me!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Yeah? You mean it?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Drakie wants to hug Daeva now.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Lucky!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Noooo! My nose is mine! Can't have it, even if it is a-nose-able.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Noses are red. Cuz of you!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Best. Daeva. Ever.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: I'm your favorite? I'm your favorite!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: There ain't no Daeva rich enough...to take me away from you.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Aaaaaaall the other Drakies gotta envy me!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Look! Ball! Nose!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: You want me to jump how high? Of course!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: I can balance this one! I can!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Jump and turn! Jump and turn! I practiced this just for you.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Of course! I love my ball.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Of course! I love my ball.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Toss it! Toss it!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Toss it! Toss it!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Kew! Who's the winner? Me!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Kew! Who's the winner? Me!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: You knew we could do it! You're so smart.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: You knew we could do it! You're so smart.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Yay! Play with me!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Yay! Play with me!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: We're a great team.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: We're a great team.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: You're my best friend.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: You're my best friend.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Nu-uh. You need to clean up!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Nu-uh. You need to clean up!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: I might've played in the dust a little longer...

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: I might've played in the dust a little longer...

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Polish my nose! Polish!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Polish my nose! Polish!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Sparkle-ify! Kew!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Sparkle-ify! Kew!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Ooooooone big, fluffy bubble... Twooooo big, fluffy bubbles...

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Ooooooone big, fluffy bubble... Twooooo big, fluffy bubbles...

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Can you find me? I'm in the bubbles!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Can you find me? I'm in the bubbles!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Whee! Bubbles!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Whee! Bubbles!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Will I still look like me? When I'm clean?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Will I still look like me? When I'm clean?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Cuddles!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Cuddles!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Jump! Jump! Nose!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Jump! Jump! Nose!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: My nose works hard.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: My nose works hard.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Kew! No sweat, Big Drakie.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Kew! No sweat, Big Drakie.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Yeah! I'm so good at this.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Yeah! I'm so good at this.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Drakies need strong legs. Or else their noses tip over!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Drakies need strong legs. Or else their noses tip over!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Are you going to train too?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Are you going to train too?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: I can keep my nose up. See?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: I can keep my nose up. See?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Ta-dah!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Ta-dah!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Deco_DrakyPET_01
string.body: Let's go again. Again!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Deco_DrakyPET_02
string.body: Let's go again. Again!

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Deco_LarailPET
string.body: Shhh. This is our little secret.

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Deco_LarailPET
string.body: Ummm, I'm sorry. It all just...gets to be too much sometimes.

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Deco_LarailPET
string.body: I suppose I'm just meant to be alone.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: Oh, well thank you. But...everybody can hear you.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: Oh, well thank you. I know you appreciate me, but everyone heard you.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: Oh, gosh. You're too kind, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: I'm so embarassed. You're too kind.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: You know I really appreciate your kindness, but it makes me feel weird.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: Thanks for your kindness, but you really don't have to....

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: I am the luckiest pet in all Atreia!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: I am so lucky to have you as my master!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: Gosh, thanks.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: You really mean the world to me, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: Your adulation makes me feel weird inside.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: I would give my life for you, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: Seriously? You are so sweet, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: You make my heart feel like a bouquet of flowers.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: I feel the same way about you!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: You are the sunshine to my flower.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: I just got that warm, fuzzy feeling, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: I just got that warm, fuzzy feeling, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: This is the best ball in all of Atreia!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: You bought me a gift?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: This is the best ball ever!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: This is the best ball ever!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: I want everyone to know you gave this to me.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: I want everyone to know how much I love this ball!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: What a great game!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: You, me, playing together! What could be better?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: Whoah, easy... Be careful, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: Take caution, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: Salute the day!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: La, la, la, la, laaaaaaaa!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: I know what I think. What do you think?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: Hmm...what do you think?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: What a great day to have a master like you!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: King of the Larails! It's beautiful out today!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: Doo, doo, doody-doo.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: La, la, doody-dah.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: Bubbles are so much fun!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: Bubbles make me clean, clean, clean!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: I feel marvelous!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: I feel so good I wanna dance!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: Umm...thank you but, umm, people are looking at us.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: Let's keep this one a secret, all right, master?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: Bubbly, bubbly, bubbly...I'll get clean doubly!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: Bubbly, bubbly, bubbly...bath time is lovely!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: I...I love it, master. But everyone is watching.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: I...I love it, master. But everyone can see us.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: I match my clothes with my ears!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: When you dress well, you feel well.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: Oh my, there are so many people here.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: Look at this crowd!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: You've got such gentle hands, master.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: Not too hard, please.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: I feel so good!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: You...complete me.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: Although not a big fan of exercising, I do love to jump some rope.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: Jumping rope, doodly doodly doo...I am jumping rope!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: My legs are my best asset, master.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: My legs are my best asset, master.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: This always makes me feel better.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: This always makes me feel better.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: I'm a champ now! Just like you, master!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: I feel good now!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: Is this...public training? And...people can see us?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: Is this...public training? And...people can see us?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: No sweat, huh?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: No sweat, huh?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: I'm an old pro at this.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: I practically grew up doing this.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: With two strong legs and these ears, nothing is impossible!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: With two strong legs and these ears, nothing is impossible!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Deco_LarailPET_01
string.body: I can do this!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Deco_LarailPET_02
string.body: As simple as hopping.

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Deco_KircaPET
string.body: I dance very well, yes?

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Deco_KircaPET
string.body: But I don't wanna!

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Deco_KircaPET
string.body: This sucks! I feel like a ghost.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: Praise me loud, boss! Praise me loud!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: Praise me loud, boss! Praise me loud!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: Yay! Yes! Boom! You like me!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: A superior pet remains modest even when complimented.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: Strangely enough, I feel really good right now.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: It's unusual, boss, but I feel pretty good today.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: I am amped up and ready to kill some stuff now!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: I am ready for adventure now, boss!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: You are too kind!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: Your kindness is too kind.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: So...you really like me then?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: Thanks, boss.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: ...so, he said it could be depression, but I'm holding out hope for Paradox Disorder.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: ...so, he said it could be depression, but I'm holding out hope for Paradox Disorder.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: Wonderful!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: Great, great, great!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: If I could wipe my tears with these little hands, I would.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: I'm so happy I could pass out! If...if I do, you'll carry me, right?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: It just keeps rolling and rolling! What a perfect ball!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: It just keeps rolling and rolling! What a perfect ball!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: The secret is in the rhythm, boss. Watch me....

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: I never get tired. Really. Never get tired.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: Thanks for playing with me, boss. I know you're busy. It meant a lot.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: Thanks for playing with me, boss. I know you've got a lot on your mind.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: Yes! Yes! Yes!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: Yes! Yes! Yes!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: You like that? I'm as quick as a river!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: My arms may be lacking, but I can sure run like the wind!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: Oddly enough, I find myself humming lately.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: Oddly enough, I find myself humming a lot.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: Come on, boss, tell me what's bothering you.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: Come on, boss, tell me what's bothering you.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: I recognize that I am quite unique.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: I recognize that I am quite unique.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: This may not go down well, boss.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: Who's a clean Kirca? I'm a clean Kirca!

string.body: Bubbles remind me of my youth.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: Bubbles remind me of my youth.

string.body: I hope that's just dirt in the water, boss.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: I hope that's just dirt in the water, boss.

string.body: My fur shines now!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: My fur shines now!

string.body: A real professional wash job, boss.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: A real professional wash job, boss.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_01
string.body: I realize I've been a little moody, boss. I'll snap out of it.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: I realize I've been a little moody, boss. I'll snap out of it.

string.body: What's so special about today? Huh?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: What's so special about today? Huh?

string.body: I could do this every day, boss. Seriously.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Deco_KircaPET_02
string.body: I could do this every day, boss. Seriously.

string.body: I can do it! I can do it!

string.body: I'm a strong believer in habitual exercise, boss.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_PhiviyongPET_01

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: It's like sunshine on a spare, winter day.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: I'm getting so light my wings are fluttering!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: Nice of you to say.... Ooooh, shiny!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_PhiviyongPET_01
string.body: I'm gonna wave my eyebrows over here. And then wave them over there. Like a cheer Aukwi!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: I'm gonna wave my eyebrows over here. And then wave them over there. Like a cheer Aukwi!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_PhiviyongPET_01
string.body: You need me like Aether. My job security comforts me during the colder times.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: You need me like Aether. My job security comforts me during the colder times.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_PhiviyongPET_01
string.body: Please. Don't. Stop!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: Please. Don't. Stop!

string.body: Hmmm? What was that? I got distracted.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: Hmmm? What was that? I got distracted.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_PhiviyongPET_01
string.body: My beak entrances you. Now watch closely as I move it left, right. Left, right. Left, right.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: My beak entrances you. Now watch closely as I move it left, right. Left, right. Left, right.

string.body: Really? It's like you're holding me in a fluffy ball in the palm of your hand. Like when I first hatched. Mmmm.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: Really? It's like you're holding me in a fluffy ball in the palm of your hand. Like when I first hatched. Mmmm.

string.body: It's so round! Rounder than I am!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: It's so round! Rounder than I am!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: Follow, follow the ball. Ooooh, what's that?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Deco_PhiviyongPET_01
string.body: Look! It balances on my beak like another Aukwi might.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: Look! It balances on my beak like another Aukwi might.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Deco_PhiviyongPET_01
string.body: When I grow up, I want to be a ball.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: When I grow up, I want to be a ball.

string.body: And then we move the ball over here. Now it's a treasure we can find later!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: And then we move the ball over here. Now it's a treasure we can find later!

string.body: Here, ball-y, ball-y, ball-y. We can be friends!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: Here, ball-y, ball-y, ball-y. We can be friends!

string.body: Keep your eye on the ball!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: Don't stare like a bug-eyed Elroco. I'm blushing!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Deco_PhiviyongPET_02
string.body: I feel fluffy. Oh so fluffy!

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Deco_DebriePET
string.body: Sometimes, I get to talking, and then the other pets think, "That Ribbit. He never shuts up." And then I'm all alone, but that's all right because I can talk to myself.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_01
string.body: Let's go out there and meet people! Errr, pets?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_02

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_01
string.body: I could leap from a tall cliff and land on airy wings, kururuk. But we probably shouldn't test that.

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Aler_ScreamShugoRED
string.body: I look really scary, don't I? Eeek! Bleahhh! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Aler_ScreamShugoRED
string.body: This is the most boring job I have ever had, nyerk!

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Aler_ScreamShugoRED
string.body: I demand attention, or I am gonna walk, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: Praise like that is just as much payment as Kinah! Well, sort of.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: You do not treat me like mere pet. That is good!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: Praise is golden, yet free! Free is good! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: I like my costume too! I got it for cheap from garage sale!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: I do not usually take praise from poor people, but I make exception in your case!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: That was good praise! Maybe back up with a little Kinah...?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: Remember, I am not pet! I am...employee! No, partner!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: I am glad you praise me! I am very sensitive Shugo! Lots of peer pressure, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: I cannot help but wonder...am I gonna owe you for this later?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: You like mask? Artisan named Munch made it!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: You are good mast...employer! Partner! That is what I meant, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: You are good...for Daeva! Have long way to go to beat Shugo, though! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: You have keen eye! Shugos always do well!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: I do what I am paid for! Not that you are paying me right now, but...

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: I like to think we are friends! So.... Can I borrow a hundred Kinah?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: Of course! Shugos have to stay lean and mean! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: You have made friend for life! You can count on me any time, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: Do you like scary stories? Well, you certainly like me! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: Shugos need plenty of exercise!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02

string.body: While you are at it, could you launder my cloak?

string.body: Are you sure you have never done this before?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: You really know how to take care of a Shugo!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: I feel pretty, oh so pretty.... What are you looking at me like that for?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: Kinah is useless if you don't have your health, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: Kinah is useless if you don't have your health, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: Shugos must be in shape! Or else cannot make good Kinah!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: Shugos must be in shape! Or else cannot make good Kinah!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: And stretch! And twist! And jog! And nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: And stretch! And twist! And jog! And nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: Speed and flexibility are very important in business!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: Speed and flexibility are very important in business!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: We Shugo don't just laze behind the counter, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: We Shugo don't just laze behind the counter, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: Whew! I usually don't work this hard, nyerk! But it is kind of fun!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: Whew! I usually don't work this hard, nyerk! But it is kind of fun!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: You are paying me extra for this, right?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: You are paying me extra for this, right?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: Shugos do not know meaning of "impossible"! No dictionary! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: Shugos do not know meaning of "impossible"! No dictionary! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: Look at muscles! Workout is paying off big time!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Aler_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: Who knew exercise could be fun! Have you to thank for it!

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue
string.body: Shugos are smart, clever, AND cute! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue
string.body: I am hot! I am hungry! I am tired! Fix it, nyerk!

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue
string.body: You are not paying me enough to be so bored, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: You have good judgment for a Daeva! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: I went to much trouble to get cloak right shade of blue!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: If you praise me like that all the time, I give discount on salary! Maybe!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: Praise no replacement for Kinah, but feels almost as good to get!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: This is good day for me!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: What is your favorite scary story?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: Shugos have many rules for success! Keep this up, maybe tell them to you!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: Feel so good, I will murder...high prices, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: I owe you much for praise! Well, not Kinah, but something better!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: Bet you say that to all the Shugos, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: If all my customers were so nice, I wouldn't chea...uh, charge so much!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: You have quite a way, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: I thought all Daevas were serious and mean! I was wrong!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: This is looking to be a great job, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: We make great team! When will we fight Balaur again?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: I almost forgot about making Kinah! You are that good at praise!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: This costume very hot! But hearing praise makes discomfort worth it!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: Just give me word! I will slice and dice your enemies! Hiyah!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: Would you like to play a game?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: Would you like to play a game?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: Do not call what I do "trick!" Is demeaning! Call it "talent"!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: Do not call what I do "trick!" Is demeaning! Call it "talent"!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: You think this is good, should see what I can do with three Daggers and Porgus, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: You think this is good, should see what I can do with three Daggers and Porgus, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: Oooh, maybe I should go into show business!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: Oooh, maybe I should go into show business!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: Will do this for you, but will expect extra pay, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: Will do this for you, but will expect extra pay, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: I love showing off talent!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: I love showing off talent!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: Bah, so easy! Give me harder one, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: Bah, so easy! Give me harder one, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: Not doing this for you! Doing this for pride of Shugos, got it?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: Not doing this for you! Doing this for pride of Shugos, got it?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: You are first Daeva who shows appreciation for what I can do!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: You are first Daeva who shows appreciation for what I can do!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: Make sure to iron and starch robe, okay?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: Make sure to iron and starch robe, okay?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Aler_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: Maybe could take shower? I like to sing in shower!

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Aler_NyancoGold
string.body: How do I look? I look good, right? I look cuter than that other Nyanco, right?

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Aler_NyancoGold
string.body: You don't care about me! Do you? You just can't stand being alone!

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Aler_NyancoGold
string.body: As much as I love my own company, I'm a bit bored.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Aler_NyancoGold_01
string.body: Oh...you're too kind. Well...you're all right.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Aler_NyancoGold_02
string.body: A compliment. How sweet.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Aler_NyancoGold_01
string.body: I know you think I'm the prettiest, but I'd like to hear you say it once in awhile.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Aler_NyancoGold_02
string.body: I'm your only Nyanco, right? It's just you and me, right?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Aler_NyancoGold_01
string.body: Why do you always act like this?!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Aler_NyancoGold_02
string.body: You charming devil, you! You know just what to say to get my tail all fuzzy.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Aler_NyancoGold_01
string.body: I'm not jealous of other Nyancos! I just don't want you looking at them!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Aler_NyancoGold_02
string.body: I want to be your favorite pet...your only pet would be best.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Aler_NyancoGold_01
string.body: You know just how to butter my bread...on both sides.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Aler_NyancoGold_02
string.body: Your sweet words are intoxicating. You are my wine, my sunshine, my wings.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Aler_NyancoGold_01
string.body: You are the wind beneath my little wings!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Aler_NyancoGold_02
string.body: I just know we’ll be best friends forever!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Aler_NyancoGold_01
string.body: I know I've been difficult lately. I'm going to try to be more understanding.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Aler_NyancoGold_02
string.body: Your sweet words are like wine to my ears.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Aler_NyancoGold_01
string.body: Look how envious all the other pets are of me! They sooo want to be me.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Aler_NyancoGold_02
string.body: You're always going to love me as much as you do now, right? Promise me that.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Aler_NyancoGold_01
string.body: It makes me so happy when you say stuff like that.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Aler_NyancoGold_02
string.body: Can you feel my heart pounding? I'm so excited to see you!

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Aler_ManduriBlackPET
string.body: Eeek! Eeek! Cute Manduri is standing right here!

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Aler_ManduriBlackPET
string.body: I was happier back in jungle, eeek!

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Aler_ManduriBlackPET
string.body: Eeek, I need more attention!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_01
string.body: Oh, praise! You're praising me, eeek!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_02
string.body: I must admit, I am pretty cool!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_01
string.body: It is my eyes, right? Everyone loves my eyes!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_02
string.body: To be Manduri is to be cute!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_01
string.body: Master is very nice....

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_02
string.body: Praise makes life worthwhile, eeek!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_01
string.body: Thank you! Very nice of you!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_02
string.body: You sure know how to praise a Manduri, eeek!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_01
string.body: You make me jump for joy, eeek!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_02
string.body: You're very kind. I like it!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_01
string.body: This is first time someone says something so nice!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_02
string.body: You see me for great Manduri I am, eeek!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_01
string.body: We two-legs have to stick together!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_02
string.body: Words are nice...but fruit is better!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_01
string.body: I am luckiest Manduri in the world, eeek!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_02
string.body: If you keep this up, we will be best friends!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_01

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Aler_ManduriBlackPET_02
string.body: For that, I would follow you right to Dragon Lords, eeek!

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Aler_ManduriwhitePET
string.body: I am not just wise in Manduri ways. I am also adorable!

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Aler_ManduriwhitePET
string.body: I am no normal Manduri! I am special! I have needs!

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Aler_ManduriwhitePET
string.body: This slimy mudhole is lonely! I need companionship!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_01
string.body: Praise or praise not! There is no try.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_02
string.body: Without enough praise, one can be tempted by the Evil Side.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_01
string.body: Your words of praise are sincere, and it is sincerity that matters in praise.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_02
string.body: When it comes to being a good pet, size matters not.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_01
string.body: Wars do not make one great. Only praise from others does.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_02
string.body: You have made an old Manduri happy.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_01
string.body: I am glad to contribute though I am old.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_02
string.body: I am glad you see I am not like other Manduri!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_01
string.body: I used to think I'd seen and heard it all. But I was wrong.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_02
string.body: I am glad I learned your language so long ago. It was worth it.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_01
string.body: If you're that grateful, could you crick my back for me?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_02
string.body: Some discount me because I'm old. But you praise me for the same reason!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_01
string.body: I am grateful for your aid. So I will lend you mine.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_02
string.body: Thanks to you, maybe someday I'll rejoin the war in the stars....

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_01
string.body: At least I do not look like a puppet who is wrinkled and green!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_02
string.body: Be careful. I was quite good with a staff in my youth!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_01
string.body: Mmm, yes! You are a discerning one, aren't you?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_02
string.body: I have lived a very long time, but I have never felt so appreciated!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_01
string.body: Is this the last game? No, there is another....

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_02
string.body: Is this the last game? No, there is another....

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Aler_ManduriwhitePET_02

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Ware_DonkeyGray
string.body: How do I look today, master?

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Ware_DonkeyGray
string.body: If only I were more exciting.

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Ware_DonkeyGray
string.body: Someday, others will spend time with me.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: You don't mean that.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: Thank you for your kind words, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: Please, I'd like to consider you my friend.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: With your kind encouragement, I will try to do better.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: You're too kind, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: This day is turning out better than average, thanks to you.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: You're so strong, saying such things to me.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: You give me the power to love myself.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: You're kind as usual.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: Today seems brighter than yesteday now.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: Oh, I'm quite moved!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: Dorions shouldn't cry in public, but I'm so moved...

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: Thank you for the compliment, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: I'm not good enough, but you always encourage me. Thank you.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: I know you said that just to please me, but thank you anyway.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: Really? You think I'm precious?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: I'm going to remember you said that!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: Oh, please. You're embarrassing me.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: You can't mean to have me play with such a lovely ball, can you?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: You can't mean to have me play with such a lovely ball, can you?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: I'm not good enough for such a ball...

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: I'm not good enough for such a ball...

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: Look at that, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: Look at that, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: I'm... I'm enthralled.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: I'm... I'm enthralled.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: Whoa, I feel dizzy.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: Whoa, I feel dizzy.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: I can touch the sky!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: I can touch the sky!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: You shouldn't have.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: You shouldn't have.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: I'm touched that you prepared it for me!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: I'm touched that you prepared it for me!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: I'll endeavor to make you smile

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: I'll endeavor to make you smile

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: Soft bubbles are the best!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: You've cleaned my body as well as my soul!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: There's a spot on the back of my neck that's been bothering me, master.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: Ah, this is the life.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: You probably can't help, but my hair's all tangled from carrying loads. Please brush it carefully.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: You probably can't help, but my hair's all tangled from carrying loads. Please brush it carefully.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: Mmmmm. Strong hands!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: Mmmmm. Strong hands!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: We should do this more often.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: We should do this more often.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: You made this scent for me?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: You made this scent for me?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: I don't deserve such considerate treatment.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: I don't deserve such considerate treatment.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: I couldn't be more satisfied. Thank you.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyGray_02
string.body: I couldn't be more satisfied. Thank you.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Ware_DonkeyGray_01
string.body: Please be gentle with my back. I've gotten sore from all that carrying.

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Ware_DonkeyBrown
string.body: How do I look? No, please don't answer that, master.

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Ware_DonkeyBrown
string.body: Today's just like every other day. A brain, the size of a Dorion, and it's hey! You! Carry this thing! Sigh.

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Ware_DonkeyBrown
string.body: Maybe we all have to live alone. I am an island.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyBrown_01
string.body: You are very kind.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyBrown_02
string.body: Thank you for your kind words.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyBrown_01
string.body: You flatter me, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyBrown_02
string.body: In this troubled world, we all have to be comfort each other once in a while.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyBrown_01
string.body: Your words encourage me.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyBrown_02
string.body: What can I do for someone so kind?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyBrown_01
string.body: You inspire me.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyBrown_02
string.body: Your motivational carrot will push me on. I still have to wonder about the stick...

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyBrown_01
string.body: No, no. It's you who are wonderful.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyBrown_02
string.body: You're perfect in every aspect, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyBrown_01
string.body: Flatterrer!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyBrown_02
string.body: Thank you for speaking so highly of me.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyBrown_01
string.body: Such flattery!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyBrown_02
string.body: I don't know what to say.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyBrown_01
string.body: There's nothing to say but thank you.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyBrown_02
string.body: You have such a way with words.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Ware_DonkeyBrown_01
string.body: I'll remember this moment forever.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Ware_DonkeyBrown_02
string.body: Meeting you was the best thing that ever happened to me, master.
