string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Ware_LittleshugoF
string.body: Are you my mommy, nyerk?

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Ware_LittleshugoF
string.body: Why can't I do what I want? It is not faaaaaiiirrrrr!

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Ware_LittleshugoF
string.body: Waaaaaaahhhhhhh! I'm loooooonelyyyyyyyyy!!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Mommy says I have to learn lots from you!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Oooh, I cannot wait until I tell Daddy, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: When I grow up, I wanna be just like you!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Awwww! I feel great now!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Can I have allowance now, nyerk?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Little brother will be sooooo jealous! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: When I go home, I will be better Shugo because of you!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Bet I can earn lots of Kinah! Just watch me!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: I may be small, but I am great Shugo merchant!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: I feel like I can carry lots more now, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Better be careful, or I may keep your stuff! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: I do not mind carrying heavy stuff, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: If I am so good, how about bigger allowance?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: We should have tea sometime!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: You are bestest friend in world!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: You will give me lots of Kinah now, right?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Psst, here is secret: not really child! Just short for age! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: I feel like big grownup already!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Can we play dress-up now?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Do you have any dollies?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Let's have a tea party!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Do you know any good Shugo songs, nyerk?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Let's play pretend! I'm a big strong Daeva, and you are a little Shugo, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: You are a Balaur! I am a Daeva! Try and catch me!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: I like to climb trees, but heights are scary, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: One, two, three, four! See, I can count good!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Mommy and Daddy say this is like school, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Do you have a lot of Kinah? Buy me a treat!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Let's go! Let's go!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: You're so big! Can I climb on your shoulders?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: I love toys!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Wheeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Boys are icky!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: You're it! You're it!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Let's play again tomorrow, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: You're my best friend!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: I usually don't like baths, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: I guess I am a little dirty....

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: These bubbles smell as sweet as Kinah, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Bubbles are fun! Let's pop some!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Mommy says if I don't take care of myself, I'll look like a Krall.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: I need a lot of cleaning, nyerk.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: My fur is so pretty! Isn't it pretty?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Mmm, smells good!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: You do not do a bad job, nyerk.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Akakakak! That tickles!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Am I grown up enough to wear perfume, nyerk?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Am I grown up enough to wear perfume, nyerk?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Little Shugos are dirtier than Daevas, nyerk.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Little Shugos are dirtier than Daevas, nyerk.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Mommy is nice and clean all the time.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Daddy is dirty all the time, though.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Wow! That was really nice! Thank you!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: I feel like so good, I wanna go out and play again! And get dirty!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: You are really good teacher, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: This is hard! Math is easier!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: I will tell everyone at home what a good teacher you are!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Is this really what grown-ups do?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: I see Daddy do this all the time!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: One! Three! Two.... Wait, is that right?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Daddy says Shugos have to be fit as well as smart!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Am I doing good? Am I?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Whew! My little legs are all worn out!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Mommy says Shugos are just as good as Daevas!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: If I work, will I be as tall as you?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: I do not want to rest! Let's do more!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: Daddy says nothing is impossible, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: Look how fast I am! Look, look!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: This is really fun! Like playing a game!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: This is really fun! Like playing a game!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoF_01
string.body: School is fun! Can we have school again tomorrow?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoF_02
string.body: You are not tired already, are you? I am not!

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Ware_LittleshugoM
string.body: What? I am just a little innocent Shugo! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Ware_LittleshugoM
string.body: Aww, I am bored. Come on, let's go play or something.

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Ware_LittleshugoM
string.body: I wish I had more friends.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Tch! That is true! I am the best! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: If you like me so much, how about some Kinah, nyerk?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Then can I get some candy? Please?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: Wow! I did that good? I did not know!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Dad would be proud of me!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: Mom would praise me a lot too!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: You're a nice teacher! I did not know there were any!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: Will you praise me again tomorrow? Just wondering.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Good little Shugos are rich little Shugos!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: I am glad my parents sent me to study with you!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: No one but my parents ever said something like that to me!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: See? You know I'm a good Shugo! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: So that means I am a grown-up now, right?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: We Daevas have to stick together, right? Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Thank you, partner!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: I am responsible Shugo! Not responsible for bad things, of course....

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Yay! Three cheers for me! Nyereka! Nyereka! Nyereka!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: I feel like an Empyrean Lord now!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Wow, this is so cool, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: I will be Daeva! You be big, bad Drakan! Body Smash! Hiya!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: You will not stop me, Fregion! Take that! And that!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: Maybe you can throw me up in the air so I can fly, nyerk?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: I will race you! Readysetgo! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: Grown-ups are always so slow! Hurry up, hurry up!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Let's play mudball! You do not know how? I will show you....

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: I'm not sleepy at all! I do not need a nap!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Haha! You are much more fun than little sister!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: Mom said you were strict. But you are actually a lot of fun!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: I wish I could just play all the time and never work, ever!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: I did not think grown-ups knew how to have fun.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Do you have more toys for me?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: I saw this really expensive toy in the city. Can I have it?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Zap! Pow! Bam! Oof!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: Tomorrow I will show you a better game!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: That was really really fun! You are the coolest teacher ever!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: That was a lot of fun! Now let's go to inn and get a Merry Meal!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Do I have to get a bath?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: Dad says that Daevas are always clean. Is that true?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Bubbles are for baby Shugos! I like popping them!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: My mom likes bubble baths? Are you my mom? Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: I think my fur needs trimming....

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: Hey! Not behind the ears, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: I only need a bath a few times a month!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: After this, we should go out and play again.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: I guess this is not too bad....

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: Just make sure I don't smell like flowers, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Hey, I can do that by myself!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: Hey, I can do that by myself!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: I do not have to take another bath ever after this, right?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: I do not have to take another bath ever after this, right?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: I am grown up enough to shave now, right?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: Only my clothes are dirty! Not me!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: I guess I do feel a lot better....

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: It is nice to be clean...sometimes.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Teach me to be a Daeva, nyerk?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: I want to be big and strong just like you!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: This is like playing! Sorta.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: I bet one Kinah that I can do more than you!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: I want to be as strong as Mommy is!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: Dad says we need strong legs to run from Shulacks!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Let's race to over there and back!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: So this is like gym class, right?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Think you can keep up with me? Just try! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: I'm strong! Just watch! Grrrr!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: No...I'm not...tired! Let's go...again!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: Look at me! This is a new world record!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: Bet you are proud of me now, aren't you?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: Shugos are much lighter on their feet than Daevas! Dad says so!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: I have to be strong and fast to protect Dad and Mom!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: I am going to run up and down stairs! Maybe punch frozen Porgus!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoM_01
string.body: I'm so strong now, I could fight a Dragon Lord! Lemme at them!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Ware_LittleshugoM_02
string.body: I feel really great! And it is all because of you, teacher!

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Prod_FungycatusPET
string.body: Hiya, pal. Need a good friend? Need a pet? I'm both in one green, needled package!

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Prod_FungycatusPET
string.body: Needles all over me, weird black eyes...but hey, what can I do, right?

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Prod_FungycatusPET
string.body: No one wants to play with a Mookie. Having needles seems to give many potential masters pause.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: Looking good, master. Looking real good.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: Looking good, master. Looking real good.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: Master, do my eyes look natural for a Mookie?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: Master, do my eyes look natural for a Mookie?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: You don't have to say it. Implied compliments are just as good as voiced ones.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: You don't have to say it. Implied compliments are just as good as voiced ones.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: You're still all right with choosing me as your pet, right? No regrets on that one?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: You're still all right with choosing me as your pet, right? No regrets on that one?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: You flatter me!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: You flatter me!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: You make me feel like the happiest Mookie in all Atreia!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: You make me feel like the happiest Mookie in all Atreia!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: That was a compliment, right?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: That was a compliment, right?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: With you leading the way, master, I feel like we can accomplish anything!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: With you leading the way, master, I feel like we can accomplish anything!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: You are the best thing that's ever happened to me. You plucked me out of obscurity and gave me hope.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: You are the best thing that's ever happened to me. You plucked me out of obscurity and gave me hope.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: I thank you, master, but I fear my needles might puncture it.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: I thank you, master, but I fear my needles might puncture it.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: I'm going to write my name on this ball so everyone knows it's mine.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: I'm going to write my name on this ball so everyone knows it's mine.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: Boom! Forehead party!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: Boom! Forehead party!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: A life without a ball is no life at all.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: A life without a ball is no life at all.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: Watch me knock this ball with my face! Watch this, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: Watch me knock this ball with my face! Watch this, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: I'm full of surprising talents.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: I'm full of surprising talents.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: I really appreciate you playing with me. You know that, right?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: I really appreciate you playing with me. You know that, right?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: It's play-time! It's play-time! Gonna have a good time at play-time!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: It's play-time! It's play-time! Gonna have a good time at play-time!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: I won't ever betray you, master. I am your wingman for life.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: I won't ever betray you, master. I am your wingman for life.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: Watch yourself! These needles on my back are deceptively unnoticeable.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: Watch yourself! These needles on my back are deceptively unnoticeable.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: That...that was amazing. I feel like a warm bowl of aloe vera now.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: That...that was amazing. I feel like a warm bowl of aloe vera now.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: You're going to scrub the needles right off me, master!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: You're going to scrub the needles right off me, master!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: I shine like a flower now.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: I shine like a flower now.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: I'll bulk up for you, master. I've got your back.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: I'll bulk up for you, master. I've got your back.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: I will become stronger, faster, capable of tearing the Balaur limb from limb.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: I will become stronger, faster, capable of tearing the Balaur limb from limb.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: You've got real leader qualities. That was the first thing I noticed about you.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: You've got real leader qualities. That was the first thing I noticed about you.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: You make me want to be a better Mookie.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: You make me want to be a better Mookie.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: My humble life has been enriched by your company.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: My humble life has been enriched by your company.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: What if the rope knocks me unconscious? What then?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: What if the rope knocks me unconscious? What then?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: Did you see that? Who needs legs, huh?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: Did you see that? Who needs legs, huh?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: Did you know that I sweat aloe vera? So, if you need some....

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: Did you know that I sweat aloe vera? So, if you need some....

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: I will become the strongest Mookie Atreia has ever seen!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: I will become the strongest Mookie Atreia has ever seen!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: Cheer up, master.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: Cheer up, master.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: So, if I was taller and had flesh...and functioning legs, do you think we'd still hang out?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: So, if I was taller and had flesh...and functioning legs, do you think we'd still hang out?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: This is just Mookie versus nature right now.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: This is just Mookie versus nature right now.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: I'm so sweaty, I'm glazed in aloe vera. It's like I'm wearing a salad dressing.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: I'm so sweaty, I'm glazed in aloe vera. It's like I'm wearing a salad dressing.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Prod_FungycatusPET_01
string.body: One more time? You want me to what now?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Prod_FungycatusPET_02
string.body: One more time? You want me to what now?

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Prod_ShellizardPET
string.body: Hey, look! Look here! Look what I can do!

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Prod_ShellizardPET
string.body: Oh, I'm too big to go and do something like that.

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Prod_ShellizardPET
string.body: I may just be a pet, but I know what it means to be alone.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: Yeah, yeah. I heard you.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: Yeah, yeah. I heard you.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: I know I'm homely. You don't have to placate me.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: I know I'm homely. You don't have to placate me.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: You've been kinder to me than anyone else ever has.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: You've been kinder to me than anyone else ever has.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: I know I'm a bit husky. I prefer to think of it as hatchling fat.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: I know I'm a bit husky. I prefer to think of it as hatchling fat.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: So, you just say something nice but don't want anything in return? Have you seen me?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: So, you just say something nice but don't want anything in return? Have you seen me?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: Now I'm starting to feel uncomfortable with all your nice words.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: Now I'm starting to feel uncomfortable with all your nice words.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: I'm really a good, decent Ksellid once you get to know me.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: I'm really a good, decent Ksellid once you get to know me.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: So THIS is what they call a compliment? It feels pretty good. Have you people always done this?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: So THIS is what they call a compliment? It feels pretty good. Have you people always done this?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: I'm the happiest Ksellid in the whole blasted world right now.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: I'm the happiest Ksellid in the whole blasted world right now.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: Play, huh? Just sit here and play? Really?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: Play, huh? Just sit here and play? Really?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: If I hear just one comment about me looking like this ball, I'm going to get angry.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: If I hear just one comment about me looking like this ball, I'm going to get angry.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: You can play with me if you want to. Everyone else is a bit creeped out by me.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: You can play with me if you want to. Everyone else is a bit creeped out by me.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: I'm so happy right now, I could shard right here in front of all these people.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: I'm so happy right now, I could shard right here in front of all these people.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: Time really flies when you're playing around.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: Time really flies when you're playing around.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: You've really opened my eyes to this whole 'feeling happy' thing.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: You've really opened my eyes to this whole 'feeling happy' thing.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: Aside from my belly chafing, this is pretty sharding fun.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: Aside from my belly chafing, this is pretty sharding fun.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: I'd like to keep playing, if you've got the time.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: I'd like to keep playing, if you've got the time.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: You want to maybe toss the ball around with me? I'll go easy on you.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: You want to maybe toss the ball around with me? I'll go easy on you.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: Oh, sorry about that. We Ksellids don't really perspire well. We've only got one gland...and I'm sitting on it.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: Oh, sorry about that. We Ksellids don't really perspire well. We've only got one gland...and I'm sitting on it.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: I feel absolutely upright!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: I feel absolutely upright!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: Listen, big guy, you don't need to overdo it on the bathing. I don't get much prettier.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: Listen, big guy, you don't need to overdo it on the bathing. I don't get much prettier.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: For a two-legger, you're all right.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: For a two-legger, you're all right.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: You've got gentle hands. Even with the gloves on.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: You've got gentle hands. Even with the gloves on.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: I don't think I've ever been this content before.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: I don't think I've ever been this content before.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: You know, I love bubbles! They make me feel so pretty.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: You know, I love bubbles! They make me feel so pretty.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: My thick, globular body glows!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: My thick, globular body glows!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: I never knew Ksellids could be bathed! I just thought dirt was a natural part of our look.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: I never knew Ksellids could be bathed! I just thought dirt was a natural part of our look.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: Ksellids aren't known for exercise, my contractual master.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: Ksellids aren't known for exercise, my contractual master.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: Well, I'll give it my best shot. But I hope you know a good soothsayer.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: Well, I'll give it my best shot. But I hope you know a good soothsayer.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: So...I just keep jumping over this rope? For how long?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: So...I just keep jumping over this rope? For how long?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: More, more, more! I'm burning calories like a Ksellid on a mission!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: More, more, more! I'm burning calories like a Ksellid on a mission!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: It's a good burn! Feel it everywhere.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: It's a good burn! Feel it everywhere.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: Look at these cannons, will ya? See these muscles rippling?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: Look at these cannons, will ya? See these muscles rippling?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: Yeah, I feel pretty good. You were right about the exercise thing.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: Yeah, I feel pretty good. You were right about the exercise thing.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: This isn't like an everyday type of thing, is it?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: This isn't like an everyday type of thing, is it?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Prod_ShellizardPET_01
string.body: Ksellid angry! Ksellid strong! Ksellid ready for whatever the day brings us!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Prod_ShellizardPET_02
string.body: Ksellid angry! Ksellid strong! Ksellid ready for whatever the day brings us!

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Prod_Sheep
string.body: Ayas will be your ewe! Baaaa!

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Prod_Sheep
string.body: Ayas doesn't feel too good, master. Ayas feels like old mutton.

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Prod_Sheep
string.body: Ayas wants to be somebody's buck. Anybody's buck. Ayas will even be your ewe, if you're nice enough.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Hey, thanks a lot.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Ayas is really grateful you came along.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Ayas likes you a lot. Ayas' last master tried to make veal of me.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Baaaaa!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: My wool is blushing.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Baaaaa! You make my mutton chops blush.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Your kind words are the fleece sheets I want to slumber in.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: We're a team, right? You and me. Thick and thin.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: That's funny, I was going to pay you the same compliment. See, we're meant to be together.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: You're quite the good looking Daeva, yourself. Put a little of my lanolin in your hair, get a nice part to the left. A real eye-filet.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: You make Ayas feel like he just regurgitated the tastiest cud this side of Balaurea.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Ayas hasn't felt this good since Ayas was a yearling.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: You're not just buttering Ayas up to turn him into dinner, are you? Because I am delicious.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: You've been so nice to me, I'm going to will you my wool when I become one with the Aether.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Other pets are going to get envious if you keep talking to me that way.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: I've been mulling it over, and I think we make a great team.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: I've heard some bad things about lonely farmer Daevas...enough to give any Ayas pause. But you seem all right, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Ever heard about the farmer Daeva and the Ayas on a cliff?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Baaaaa! I mean, baaaalllll! Baaaallll!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Baaaaa! I mean, baaaalllll! Baaaallll!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: I'm somewhat hesitant to play with something that has no fur. But, what the heck! I'll give it a try.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: I'm somewhat hesitant to play with something that has no fur. But, what the heck! I'll give it a try.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: You've got me blushing like a mutton chop.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: You've got me blushing like a mutton chop.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: I haven't felt this good since the farm days.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: I haven't felt this good since the farm days.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: I must look adorable playing with this thing!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: I must look adorable playing with this thing!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Wool you like to play ball with me? Get it? I've been quite the cut-up since I was veal height.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Wool you like to play ball with me? Get it? I've been quite the cut-up since I was veal height.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Have anything pressing on your agenda? I just want to pal around with you all day.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Have anything pressing on your agenda? I just want to pal around with you all day.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: I feel veal-tastic! Get it? It's like...well, other Ayases found it funny. It's a thinker.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: I feel veal-tastic! Get it? It's like...well, other Ayases found it funny. It's a thinker.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: You're going to wash away all my lanolin, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: You're going to wash away all my lanolin, master!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Mmm, what smells like stew? Is...is that me cooking?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Mmm, what smells like stew? Is...is that me cooking?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: We're having a bubble party!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: We're having a bubble party!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Baaaa! My wool is all wet. I smell like wet Ayas now.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Baaaa! My wool is all wet. I smell like wet Ayas now.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: You're my best pal ever, Daeva. I'd share my last mouthful of cud with you.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: You're my best pal ever, Daeva. I'd share my last mouthful of cud with you.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Some Ayases might find it a little weird for us to be having a conversation while I bathe, but I trust you.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Some Ayases might find it a little weird for us to be having a conversation while I bathe, but I trust you.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: The ewes are going to love me tonight!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: The ewes are going to love me tonight!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: My wool is glowing.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: My wool is glowing.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Baaaa! That was nice! I feel as tender as veal now.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Baaaa! That was nice! I feel as tender as veal now.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Baaaa!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Baaaa!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Ayas loves to exercise. Exercise keeps my chops tender and delicious.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Ayas loves to exercise. Exercise keeps my chops tender and delicious.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Pretty good, eh? Ayas learned to jump rope by escaping the butcher.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Pretty good, eh? Ayas learned to jump rope by escaping the butcher.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: What was that, about 120? 120 jumps? You're counting, right?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: What was that, about 120? 120 jumps? You're counting, right?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Sure, master, I'll run for you. Run right back to the farm....

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Sure, master, I'll run for you. Run right back to the farm....

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Okay, one more set, master. One more set. Then I need to rest my chops for a few....

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Okay, one more set, master. One more set. Then I need to rest my chops for a few....

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: It's okay to both be my friend and find me delicious to look at.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: It's okay to both be my friend and find me delicious to look at.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: I can do this all day, master!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: I can do this all day, master!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: I'll be your buck, I'll be your ewe, I'll even be your lamb, if asked nicely. You and Ayas are partners!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: I'll be your buck, I'll be your ewe, I'll even be your lamb, if asked nicely. You and Ayas are partners!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Prod_Sheep_01
string.body: Watch how quickly I run. Self-trained, too. I just imagine there's a farmer with a pair of clippers behind me. And I'm not talking about hair clippers.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Prod_Sheep_02
string.body: Watch how quickly I run. Self-trained, too. I just imagine there's a farmer with a pair of clippers behind me. And I'm not talking about hair clippers.

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Prod_PorgussPET
string.body: We're not only smarter than Daggs and Kitters, we're cuter!

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Prod_PorgussPET
string.body: Ugh.... Wake me up when something interesting happens....

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Prod_PorgussPET
string.body: Here I am.... All alone.... Unloved.... Poor me....

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Deco_Retriever
string.body: Hey, buddy! Hey, buddy! You look like you could use a good friend, huh? A good loyal friend. I can see it in your eyes.

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Deco_Retriever
string.body: I'm house-trained, I'm loyal, I'm cute.... And I'm still all alone.

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Deco_Retriever
string.body: Even a good bark seems futile when you're alone.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: Oh, that's good, master. Yeah, tell me I'm a good boy again.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: Oh, that's good, master. Yeah, tell me I'm a good boy again.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: Want to go for a walk now? Want to go for a walk now?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: Want to go for a walk now? Want to go for a walk now?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: Daggs have always been a Daeva's best friend.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: Daggs have always been a Daeva's best friend.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: We have a bond, you and I.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: We have a bond, you and I.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: Every Dagg could use a nice, kind master like yourself.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: Every Dagg could use a nice, kind master like yourself.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: Ruff! Ruff! I'm a good boy! I'm a good boy!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: Ruff! Ruff! I'm a good boy! I'm a good boy!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: Thanks, master. You know just what to say to cheer a Dagg up.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: Thanks, master. You know just what to say to cheer a Dagg up.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: I'm just aggressively hugging your leg, master. I'll be done in a sec....

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: I'm just aggressively hugging your leg, master. I'll be done in a sec....

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: Ruff! Ruff! Did I just hear 'walkies'?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: Ruff! Ruff! Did I just hear 'walkies'?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: This is...this is a wonderful ball, master. You really went above and beyond on this one.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: This is...this is a wonderful ball, master. You really went above and beyond on this one.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: This is where having four legs comes in real handy.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: This is where having four legs comes in real handy.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: Thanks a lot for playing ball with me, master. I know you're busy and stuff. I just want you to know that it meant a lot to me.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: Thanks a lot for playing ball with me, master. I know you're busy and stuff. I just want you to know that it meant a lot to me.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: This is as much fun as killing Kitters, you know that? This is a blast, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: This is as much fun as killing Kitters, you know that? This is a blast, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: Check this out, master.... This side looks just like this side! They're absolutely the same. This is amazing!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: Check this out, master.... This side looks just like this side! They're absolutely the same. This is amazing!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: Happiness is a warm ball and a Daeva to throw it far from you.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: Happiness is a warm ball and a Daeva to throw it far from you.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: I never knew life could be this much fun, master. You've really opened my eyes today.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: I never knew life could be this much fun, master. You've really opened my eyes today.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: Nothing could be more fun than this, master. Seriously, nothing.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: Nothing could be more fun than this, master. Seriously, nothing.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: As long as we have each other, master, nothing can stand in our...do you smell food?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: As long as we have each other, master, nothing can stand in our...do you smell food?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: Sure, a bath, sure. We don't really sweat like you Daevas do since we don't have sweat glands, but a bath sounds pretty fun.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: Sure, a bath, sure. We don't really sweat like you Daevas do since we don't have sweat glands, but a bath sounds pretty fun.

string.body: Whoa, whoa, whoah...a bubble bath? Did I just become one with the Aether or something? Is this real?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: Whoa, whoa, whoah...a bubble bath? Did I just become one with the Aether or something? Is this real?

string.body: Ruff! You've got gentle hands for a Daeva.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: You've brightened my life, master. You've got a real winning way with the Daggs.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: You've brightened my life, master. You've got a real winning way with the Daggs.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_02

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: Any chance people will believe you're blind and I'm your seeing-eye Dagg? We could have some kicks with that one!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: Any chance people will believe you're blind and I'm your seeing-eye Dagg? We could have some kicks with that one!

string.body: You've made me the happiest Dagg in the whole severed world, master.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: You've made me the happiest Dagg in the whole severed world, master.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: This here...this is the way life should be, master.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Deco_Retriever_01
string.body: I always wondered what true happiness felt like. It's not heat season, like my pals said. It's this, with you, master.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: I always wondered what true happiness felt like. It's not heat season, like my pals said. It's this, with you, master.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Deco_Retriever_02
string.body: You've got my back, master, and I've got yours.

string.body: Just because I appear to be smiling does not mean I'm happy on the inside.

string.body: I could sure use a master. Hint. Hint.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Ware_Bearpanther_02
string.body: You have made me a stronger Ailu!

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Deco_DebriePET_02
string.body: If two Ribbits are too much, then one Ribbit is totally the best, right? Not that there's anything wrong with other Ribbits.

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Deco_DebriePET_02
string.body: Why won't you pay attention to meeeeeeeee?

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Deco_DebriePET_02
string.body: So sometimes, I get to talking, and then the other pets think, "That Ribbit. He never shuts up." And then I'm all alone, but that's all right because I can talk to myself. I'm a brilliant conversationalist and....

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_02_01
string.body: Let's go out there and meet people! Errr, pets?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_02_02
string.body: Really? I could jump for joy!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_02_01
string.body: I could leap from a tall cliff and land on airy wings, kururuk. But we probably shouldn't test that.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_02_02
string.body: Jump up, then jump again! I've got happy legs.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_02_01
string.body: Can you say that again? Louder?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_02_02
string.body: I thought about getting another owner, but you've changed my mind back again.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_02_01
string.body: You did a marvelous job too. Well, not as good as I, obviously, but you're getting there....

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_02_02
string.body: You think so? Hooray!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_02_01
string.body: That's the nicest thing you've said in ages. Not that you aren't nice in general, just that...oh, you know.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_02_02
string.body: You like me! You really like me!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_02_01
string.body: Is it a secret? Whisper in my ear. I promise not to tell.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_02_02
string.body: Do it more. Tell me all about my virtues.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_02_01
string.body: You only say nice things about this Ribbit. Right? I said, Isn't that right?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_02_02
string.body: Bigmouth strikes again? You know you love it!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_02_01
string.body: Spring time! Not the season, the game!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_02_02
string.body: What? You like how I lay down? Well, it's normal for a Ribbit...

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_DebriePET_02_01
string.body: Tell me more. It's your turn to talk.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_DebriePET_02_02
string.body: I'll savor your words.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_02_02
string.body: Even a newborn Ribbit knows how to play ball!

string.body: Clap as loudly as possible!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_02_01
string.body: I bet I can get it with my back legs. Okay, I bet I can get it with my back legs two times out of thr....fou....

string.body: Step one, clean your Ribbit thoroughly. Step two, go back and check the navel because we both know...

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_02_02
string.body: Step one, clean your Ribbit thoroughly. Step two, go back and check the navel because we both know...

string.body: To be as carefree as a bubble...

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_02_02
string.body: To be as carefree as a bubble...

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_02_01
string.body: Clean these pores! You're supposed to make sure I don't break out or anything. That's what owners are for. Otherwise, we'd just leave.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_02_02
string.body: Clean these pores! You're supposed to make sure I don't break out or anything. That's what owners are for. Otherwise, we'd just leave.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_02_01
string.body: Actually, I need to brush my teeth.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_02_02
string.body: Actually, I need to brush my teeth.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_02_01
string.body: Goodbye, dirt. I knew you well. But 'tis nobler to be a clean Ribbit.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_02_02
string.body: Goodbye, dirt. I knew you well. But 'tis nobler to be a clean Ribbit.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_02_01
string.body: Y'know, I was talking to another pet the other day, and she wasn't near as clean as I am. So we're doing a good job!

string.body: My legs are short, but I'll do my best!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Deco_DebriePET_07_02
string.body: My legs are short, but I'll do my best!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Deco_DebriePET_07_01
string.body: All that jumping really works up a pond scum. Well, sweat, but I think pond scum is a much more dignified expression.

string.body: When's it gonna be time for me?

string.body: If every Ribbit in the world lived here, we'd be wailin'.

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Deco_FungyPET
string.body: I realize that I'm an odd pet choice, but I'm well worth it.

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Deco_FungyPET
string.body: You see the size of this head? You think you have troubles? I'm a Fungie!

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Deco_FungyPET
string.body: Why does nobody ever want to have a Fungie as a pet? We're loyal, friendly, outgoing!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: I'm good, master. I'm good. How are you doing?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: I'm good, master. I'm good. How are you doing?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: Some say we're the cutest pets because we have no noses...or ears...and buggy little eyes.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: Some say we're the cutest pets because we have no noses...or ears...and buggy little eyes.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: You keep talking like that, and I'll never leave your side.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: You keep talking like that, and I'll never leave your side.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: This puts the "fun" back in Fungie, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: This puts the "fun" back in Fungie, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: I'm so happy right now...my cap is blushing.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: I'm so happy right now...my cap is blushing.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: Seriously.... You are the Brax filet in a world of ground meat.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: Seriously.... You are the Brax filet in a world of ground meat.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: Just because I was raised on Kerubar droppings does not mean I appreciate that language, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: Just because I was raised on Kerubar droppings does not mean I appreciate that language, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: With you by my side, I feel we can do just about anything, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: With you by my side, I feel we can do just about anything, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: You, master, are the Kerubar dung that raises me to new heights.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: You, master, are the Kerubar dung that raises me to new heights.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: This ball looks strangely familiar.... I feel very close to it for some reason.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: This ball looks strangely familiar.... I feel very close to it for some reason.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: If you smell something like mushroom soup, that's just me sweating!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: If you smell something like mushroom soup, that's just me sweating!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: I've learned to improvise without the use of hands.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: I've learned to improvise without the use of hands.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: There was life before this ball, and then there's life after this ball.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: There was life before this ball, and then there's life after this ball.

string.body: Headbutt!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: Headbutt!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: I've been told that I have some amazing qualities, master. I see you've noticed for yourself.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: I've been told that I have some amazing qualities, master. I see you've noticed for yourself.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: I appreciate your candor, master. I'll take that comment about how tasty I look as a compliment.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: I appreciate your candor, master. I'll take that comment about how tasty I look as a compliment.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: Who's the happiest fungus among us?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: Who's the happiest fungus among us?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: So the bartender stabs him and shouts, "I said he was a real fun guy, not a fungie!"

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: So the bartender stabs him and shouts, "I said he was a real fun guy, not a fungie!"

string.body: Hey, master, can you get under the cap? Where the crystals are starting to form....

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: Hey, master, can you get under the cap? Where the crystals are starting to form....

string.body: Oh, that was nice!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: Oh, that was nice!

string.body: Sniff, sniff.... Do you smell mushroom soup cooking? Is it already dinner time?

string.body: Oh yeah!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: Oh yeah!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: This exercise is good, master. I need to lose some of this spore-fat.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: This exercise is good, master. I need to lose some of this spore-fat.

string.body: I feel just like a magic mushroom now!

string.body: I feel just like a magic mushroom now!

string.body: I don't feel like such a toadstool now!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: I don't feel like such a toadstool now!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: I'm more happy now than I ever was growing up on that Brax patty down by the creek.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: I'm more happy now than I ever was growing up on that Brax patty down by the creek.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_CRITICAL_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: You see this? Hair growth.... Or maybe it's mold. You smell anything weird?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: I haven't worked out this hard since I was a spore!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: I haven't worked out this hard since I was a spore!

string.body: All right, watch this, master!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_A_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: All right, watch this, master!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: Most Fungies aren't big fans of sweat, master. We start to ferment after awhile.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: Most Fungies aren't big fans of sweat, master. We start to ferment after awhile.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: I'm doing all of this for you, master. All of it.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_B_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: I'm doing all of this for you, master. All of it.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: It's almost time for a nap, master.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: It's almost time for a nap, master.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: Could you define what you meant when you said I looked "good enough to eat"?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_C_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: Could you define what you meant when you said I looked "good enough to eat"?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: Don't you worry about my legs. They're stubby but strong.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_GOOD_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: Don't you worry about my legs. They're stubby but strong.

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_01
string.body: I am ready for some adventure now, master!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Deco_FungyPET_02
string.body: I am ready for some adventure now, master!

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Ware_DonkeyEvent
string.body: How do I look today, master?

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Ware_DonkeyEvent
string.body: Some days, I wish I hadn't woken up.

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Ware_DonkeyEvent
string.body: Someday, others will spend time with me.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_01
string.body: Thank you very much.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: Thank you very much.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_01
string.body: Please, I'd like to consider you my friend.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: Please, I'd like to consider you my friend.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_01
string.body: You're too kind, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: You're too kind, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_01
string.body: We do better together, don't you think?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: We do better together, don't you think?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_01
string.body: You're kind as usual.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: You're kind as usual.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_01
string.body: Oh, I'm quite moved!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: Oh, I'm quite moved!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_01
string.body: Thank you.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: Thank you.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_01
string.body: You're a true friend, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: You're a true friend, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Ware_DonkeyEvent_01
string.body: I'll never forget your words.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: I'll never forget your words.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_01
string.body: You can't mean to have me play with such a lovely ball, can you?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: You can't mean to have me play with such a lovely ball, can you?

string.body: I'm not good enough for such a ball...

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: I'm not good enough for such a ball...

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_01
string.body: Look at that, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: Look at that, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_01
string.body: I'm... I'm enthralled.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: I'm... I'm enthralled.

string.body: Whoa, I feel dizzy.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02

string.body: I'm touched that you prepared it for me!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: I'm touched that you prepared it for me!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Ware_DonkeyEvent_01
string.body: I'll endeavor to make you smile.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: I'll endeavor to make you smile.

string.body: Soft bubbles are the best!

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: You've cleaned my body as well as my soul!

string.body: There's a spot on the back of my neck that's been bothering me, master.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_A_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: Ah, this is the life.

string.body: Did you read my mind?

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_B_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: Mmmmm. You have talented hands.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_C_BETTER_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: You made this scent for me?

string.body: I don't deserve such considerate treatment.

string.name: STR_RE_CARE_D_GOOD_Ware_DonkeyEvent_02
string.body: I don't deserve such considerate treatment.

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Deco_ReManduriBlackPET
string.body: Eeek! Eeek! Cute Manduri is standing right here!

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Deco_ReManduriBlackPET
string.body: I was happier back in jungle, eeek!

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Deco_ReManduriBlackPET
string.body: Eeek, I need more attention!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_ReManduriBlackPET_01
string.body: Oh, praise! You're praising me, eeek!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_ReManduriBlackPET_02
string.body: I must admit, I am pretty cool!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_ReManduriBlackPET_01
string.body: It is my eyes, right? Everyone loves my eyes!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_ReManduriBlackPET_02
string.body: To be Manduri is to be cute!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_ReManduriBlackPET_01
string.body: Master is very nice....

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_ReManduriBlackPET_02
string.body: Praise makes life worthwhile, eeek!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_ReManduriBlackPET_01
string.body: Thank you! Very nice of you!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_ReManduriBlackPET_02
string.body: You sure know how to praise a Manduri, eeek!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_ReManduriBlackPET_01
string.body: You make me jump for joy, eeek!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_ReManduriBlackPET_02
string.body: You're very kind. I like it!

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Ware_ReSpriggPet
string.body: Sprigg says: Sprigg dance!

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Ware_ReSpriggPet
string.body: Sprigg says: Time spent with pet is time well spent.

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Ware_ReSpriggPet
string.body: Sprigg says: Better to live with one and know one, than live with many and know none.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Ware_ReSpriggPet_01
string.body: Sprigg says: Praise makes the world go round.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Ware_ReSpriggPet_02
string.body: Sprigg says: Must love self before praise to self can be enjoyed.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Ware_ReSpriggPet_01
string.body: Sprigg says: Better to praise foresight than hindsight.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Ware_ReSpriggPet_02
string.body: Sprigg says: What's up is up, but on the roof, what's up is down.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Ware_ReSpriggPet_01
string.body: Sprigg says: Can get full on food and drink, but never on love.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Ware_ReSpriggPet_02
string.body: Sprigg says: Love only means anything when love is meaningful.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Ware_ReSpriggPet_01
string.body: Sprigg says: One day comes praise, the next, disappointment.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Ware_ReSpriggPet_02
string.body: Sprigg says: To praise others is to improve one's own dignity.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Ware_ReSpriggPet_01
string.body: Sprigg says: It is okay to be flattered by praise at times. But, must keep feet on ground. Figuratively.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Ware_ReSpriggPet_02
string.body: Sprigg says: Better to be praised than to be punished. But not good to be praised for punishing.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Ware_ReSpriggPet_01
string.body: Sprigg says: True friends know what they say before they say it.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Ware_ReSpriggPet_02
string.body: Sprigg says: Praise is good, but must have reason.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Ware_ReSpriggPet_01
string.body: Sprigg says: Even during war, we must love.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Ware_ReSpriggPet_02
string.body: Sprigg says: Sprigg... Happy!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Ware_ReSpriggPet_01
string.body: Sprigg says: Praise sings in Sprigg heart. Sprigg happy.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Ware_ReSpriggPet_02
string.body: Sprigg says: Praise is wage for good deed. Sprigg has lived well!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Ware_ReSpriggPet_01
string.body: Sprigg says: Kind compliments comfort a hard life.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Ware_ReSpriggPet_02
string.body: Sprigg says: Praise fills recipient with spirit and vigor!

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Doping_ScreamShugoRED
string.body: I look really scary, don't I? Eeek! Bleahhh! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Doping_ScreamShugoRED
string.body: This is the most boring job I have ever had, nyerk!

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Doping_ScreamShugoRED
string.body: I demand attention, or I am gonna walk, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: Praise like that is just as much payment as Kinah! Well, sort of.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: You do not treat me like mere pet. That is good!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: Praise is golden, yet free! Free is good! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: I like my costume too! I got it for cheap from garage sale!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: I do not usually take praise from poor people, but I make exception in your case!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: That was good praise! Maybe back up with a little Kinah...?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: Remember, I am not pet! I am...employee! No, partner!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: I am glad you praise me! I am very sensitive Shugo! Lots of peer pressure, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: What is best part about me? Blood red cloak, maybe?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: You like mask? Artisan named Munch made it!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: You are good mast...employer! Partner! That is what I meant, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: You are good...for Daeva! Have long way to go to beat Shugo, though! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: You have keen eye! Shugos always do well!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: I do what I am paid for! Not that you are paying me right now, but...

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: I like to think we are friends! So.... Can I borrow a hundred Kinah?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: Of course! Shugos have to stay lean and mean! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: You have made friend for life! You can count on me any time, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: Do you like scary stories? Well, you certainly like me! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: Shugos need plenty of exercise!

string.body: Whew! I usually don't work this hard, nyerk! But it is kind of fun!

string.body: You are paying me extra for this, right?

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_01
string.body: Shugos do not know meaning of "impossible"! No dictionary! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_D_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: Shugos do not know meaning of "impossible"! No dictionary! Akakakak!
