string.body: Look at muscles! Workout is paying off big time!

string.name: STR_RE_TRAIN_CRITICAL_Doping_ScreamShugoRED_02
string.body: Who knew exercise could be fun! Have you to thank for it!

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue
string.body: Shugos are smart, clever, AND cute! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue
string.body: I am hot! I am hungry! I am tired! Fix it, nyerk!

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue
string.body: You are not paying me enough to be so bored, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: You have good judgment for a Daeva! Akakakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: I went to much trouble to get cloak right shade of blue!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: If you praise me like that all the time, I give discount on salary! Maybe!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: Praise no replacement for Kinah, but feels almost as good to get!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: This is good day for me!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: What is your favorite scary story?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: Shugos have many rules for success! Keep this up, maybe tell them to you!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: Feel so good, I will murder...high prices, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: I owe you much for praise! Well, not Kinah, but something better!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: Bet you say that to all the Shugos, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: If all my customers were so nice, I wouldn't chea...uh, charge so much!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: You have quite a way, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: I thought all Daevas were serious and mean! I was wrong!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: This is looking to be a great job, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_01
string.body: We make great team! When will we fight Balaur again?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: I almost forgot about making Kinah! You are that good at praise!

string.body: This costume very hot! But hearing praise makes discomfort worth it!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Doping_ScreamShugoBlue_02
string.body: Just give me word! I will slice and dice your enemies! Hiyah!

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan
string.body: I realize that I'm an odd pet choice, but I'm well worth it.

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan
string.body: You see the size of this head? You think you have troubles? I'm a Fungie, man! People try to eat me!

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan
string.body: Why does nobody ever want to have a Fungie as a pet? We're loyal, friendly, outgoing!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_01
string.body: I'm good, master. I'm good. How are you doing? You hanging in there?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_02
string.body: I'm good, master. I'm good. How are you doing? You hanging in there?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_01
string.body: Some say we're the cutest pets because we have no noses...or ears...and buggy little eyes.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_02
string.body: Some say we're the cutest pets because we have no noses...or ears...and buggy little eyes.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_01
string.body: You keep talking like that and I'll never leave your side.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_02
string.body: You keep talking like that and I'll never leave your side.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_01
string.body: This puts the "fun" back in Fungie, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_02
string.body: This puts the "fun" back in Fungie, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_01

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_02
string.body: I'm so happy right now...my cap is crystalizing.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_01
string.body: Seriously.... You are the Brax filet in a world of ground meat.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_02
string.body: Seriously.... You are the Brax filet in a world of ground meat.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_01
string.body: Just because I was raised on Kerubar droppings does not mean I appreciate that language, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_02
string.body: Just because I was raised on Kerubar droppings does not mean I appreciate that language, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_01
string.body: With you by my side, I feel we can do just about anything, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_02
string.body: With you by my side, I feel we can do just about anything, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_01
string.body: You, master, are the Kerubar dung that raises me to new heights.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_02
string.body: You, master, are the Kerubar dung that raises me to new heights.

string.body: If you smell something like mushroom soup, that's just me sweating!

string.body: Headbutt!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_01
string.body: I've been told that I have some amazing qualities, master. I see you've noticed for yourself.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_02
string.body: I've been told that I have some amazing qualities, master. I see you've noticed for yourself.

string.body: I appreciate your candor, master. I'll take that comment about how tasty I look as a compliment.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Deco_FungypetGreen_Japan_02
string.body: I appreciate your candor, master. I'll take that comment about how tasty I look as a compliment.

string.body: Who's the happiest fungus among us?

string.body: Who's the happiest fungus among us?

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan
string.body: I realize that I'm an odd pet choice, but I'm well worth it.

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan
string.body: You see the size of this head? You think you have troubles? I'm a Fungie, man! People try to eat me!

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan
string.body: Why does nobody ever want to have a Fungie as a pet? We're loyal, friendly, outgoing!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01
string.body: I'm good, master. I'm good. How are you doing? You hanging in there?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: I'm good, master. I'm good. How are you doing? You hanging in there?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01
string.body: Some say we're the cutest pets because we have no noses...or ears...and buggy little eyes.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: Some say we're the cutest pets because we have no noses...or ears...and buggy little eyes.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01
string.body: You keep talking like that, and I'll never leave your side.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: You keep talking like that, and I'll never leave your side.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01
string.body: This puts the "fun" back in Fungie, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: This puts the "fun" back in Fungie, master!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01
string.body: I'm so happy right now...my cap is crystalizing.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: I'm so happy right now...my cap is crystalizing.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01
string.body: Seriously.... You are the Brax filet in a world of ground meat.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: Seriously.... You are the Brax filet in a world of ground meat.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01
string.body: Just because I was raised on Kerubar droppings does not mean I appreciate that language, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: Just because I was raised on Kerubar droppings does not mean I appreciate that language, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01
string.body: With you by my side, I feel we can do just about anything, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: With you by my side, I feel we can do just about anything, master.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01
string.body: You, master, are the Kerubar dung that raises me to new heights.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: You, master, are the Kerubar dung that raises me to new heights.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: This ball looks strangely familiar.... I feel very close to it for some reason.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: If you smell something like mushroom soup, that's just me sweating!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01
string.body: I've learned to improvise without the use of hands.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: I've learned to improvise without the use of hands.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01
string.body: There was life before this ball, and then there's life after this ball.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_GOOD_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: Headbutt!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01
string.body: I've been told that I have some amazing qualities, master. I see you've noticed for yourself.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_C_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: I've been told that I have some amazing qualities, master. I see you've noticed for yourself.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01
string.body: I appreciate your candor, master. I'll take that comment about how tasty I look as a compliment.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_GOOD_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: I appreciate your candor, master. I'll take that comment about how tasty I look as a compliment.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01
string.body: Who's the happiest fungus among us?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_D_BETTER_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02
string.body: Who's the happiest fungus among us?

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_01
string.body: So the bartender stabs him and shouts, "I said he was a real fun guy, not a fungie!"

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_CRITICAL_Aler_FungypetBlue_Japan_02

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Deco_PhoenixRed_China
string.body: Cuteness, like snow, falls from my feathers.

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Deco_PhoenixRed_China
string.body: Beneath the soil, but closer than six feet, lies my heart.

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Deco_PhoenixRed_China
string.body: Even among other Bogels, I long for other Bogels.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_01
string.body: Pretty words nourish pretty flowers, but flowers bend in harder times.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_02
string.body: Pretty words nourish pretty flowers, but flowers bend in harder times.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_01
string.body: The circle of life becomes a circle of affection.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_02
string.body: The circle of life becomes a circle of affection.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_01
string.body: Like shredded leaves, your meaning has broken.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_02
string.body: Like shredded leaves, your meaning has broken.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_01
string.body: May your affections be constant as the Tower.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_02
string.body: May your affections be constant as the Tower.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_01
string.body: Witness! The smallest red feather works for you.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_02
string.body: Witness! The smallest red feather works for you.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_01
string.body: You plant seeds of affection in my compost heart.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_02
string.body: You plant seeds of affection in my compost heart.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_01
string.body: Nature rises to bless your arms.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_02
string.body: Nature rises to bless your arms.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_01
string.body: May the sun ever rise over my dearest friend.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_02
string.body: May the sun ever rise over my dearest friend.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_01
string.body: My thoughts spin in cyclons centered on you.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Deco_PhoenixRed_China_02

string.body: Games are meant for two or more. Play with me.

string.name: STR_Prod_bbobiPET_DESC
string.body: Runaway Poppy

string.name: STR_Prod_bbobiPET_DESC_LONG
string.body: A pet that gives a mystery bundle when it's fed its favorite food.

string.name: STR_ASK_CUTE_Prod_bbobiPET
string.body: Even Poppy knows a trick or two!

string.name: STR_ASK_WHINING_Prod_bbobiPET
string.body: Oi, anything exciting happening? Anyone got pie?

string.name: STR_ASK_LONE_Prod_bbobiPET
string.body: I need a friend. Pie tastes better with company.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Prod_bbobiPET_01
string.body: The more praise, the better... though not as good as a nice slice of pie!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_Prod_bbobiPET_02
string.body: The more praise, the better... though not as good as a nice slice of pie!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Prod_bbobiPET_01
string.body: Hooray!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_Prod_bbobiPET_02
string.body: Hooray!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Prod_bbobiPET_01
string.body: Praise is good, but I need food, too. I'm feeling a bit faint...

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_Prod_bbobiPET_02
string.body: Praise is good, but I need food, too. I'm feeling a bit faint...

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Prod_bbobiPET_01
string.body: I feel great. I think I've gained weight. Do I look rounder to you?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_Prod_bbobiPET_02
string.body: I feel great. I think I've gained weight. Do I look rounder to you?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Prod_bbobiPET_01
string.body: Just tell me what you really think.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_Prod_bbobiPET_02
string.body: Just tell me what you really think.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Prod_bbobiPET_01
string.body: You do like me, don't you?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_Prod_bbobiPET_02
string.body: You do like me, don't you?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Prod_bbobiPET_01
string.body: What thrilling praise! Yes indeed, I have gained weight!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_GOOD_Prod_bbobiPET_02
string.body: What thrilling praise! Yes indeed, I have gained weight!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Prod_bbobiPET_01
string.body: Praise! Oh, praise! Time for the happy dance!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_Prod_bbobiPET_02
string.body: Praise! Oh, praise! Time for the happy dance!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Prod_bbobiPET_01
string.body: I'd even share my food with you! Well, maybe not the pie...

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_Prod_bbobiPET_02
string.body: I'd even share my food with you! Well, maybe not the pie...

string.body: A ball as round as me! Beautiful!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_GOOD_Prod_bbobiPET_02
string.body: A ball as round as me! Beautiful!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Prod_bbobiPET_01
string.body: I feel wonderful! Round and wonderful!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_A_BETTER_Prod_bbobiPET_02
string.body: I feel wonderful! Round and wonderful!

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_GOOD_Prod_bbobiPET_02
string.body: I'll show you how flexible I am... err... not.

string.name: STR_RE_PLAY_B_BETTER_Prod_bbobiPET_02
string.body: Let's go! Today is Poppy's day!

string.body: I'll show you what a real talent show is!

string.body: I'm sulking! Nyerk! Need a door to slam, yes yes.

string.body: Even Shugos get lonely sometimes, nyerk nyerk.

string.body: This is exciting!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_GOOD_CashWare_LittleShugoMViolet_Term_02
string.body: I feel great!

string.body: Two rules! Praise Shugo pet, and spend kinah on Shugo pet!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_A_BETTER_CashWare_LittleShugoMViolet_Term_02
string.body: Praise is free! Praise is good! Akakak!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_CashWare_LittleShugoMViolet_Term_01
string.body: What's good today, nyerk?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_GOOD_CashWare_LittleShugoMViolet_Term_02
string.body: I feel great!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_CashWare_LittleShugoMViolet_Term_01
string.body: Praise is good master, but maybe you should be making more Kinah? Hmm?

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_B_BETTER_CashWare_LittleShugoMViolet_Term_02
string.body: Could you buy happiness like this with Kinah?

string.body: Am I going to owe you for this later? Say no. Say no!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_GOOD_CashWare_LittleShugoMViolet_Term_02
string.body: It's just a favor, nyerk nyerk.

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_CashWare_LittleShugoMViolet_Term_01
string.body: Thank you, thank you! Yes yes! More!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_C_BETTER_CashWare_LittleShugoMViolet_Term_02
string.body: The more I know you, the more I like you, nyerk!

string.body: Very good, akakak!

string.body: I must be a wonderful pet!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_CashWare_LittleShugoMViolet_Term_01
string.body: We're meant to be together, nyerk nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_D_BETTER_CashWare_LittleShugoMViolet_Term_02
string.body: Ah, a friend as valuable as Kinah!

string.body: Praise is more important than Kinah, nyerk!

string.name: STR_RE_PRAISE_CRITICAL_CashWare_LittleShugoMViolet_Term_02
string.body: This is what I live for! Akakak!

string.body: I'm tired! One more time, okay?
